title: 22: Classical Rhetorical Form
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: In this episode, A.J. takes us through an alternative to the five paragraph essay that is more useful for everyone, including those of us no longer in school. Need to convince someone of something? You can use this.
itunes:author: Donaldson, the Burgs, and the Bees
itunes:subtitle: Because nobody uses the five paragraph essay.
